name: Average Movie Trivia: Honeymoon in Vegas | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is the tagline for this 1992 comedy?
questions.correct: "A comedy about one bride, two grooms, and thirty-four flying Elvis'"
options: "A comedy about gambling, diamond rings, and flying Elvis'"
"Don't bet on love it just may cost you your fiance"
"Jack made a promise to his mother, but that didn't include flying Elvis'"
questions.explanation:
"A comedy about one bride, two grooms, and thirty-four flying Elvis'".

	This comedy was set in Las Vegas, Nevada at the Bally's Hotel.

questions.text: What grade did Betsy teach in school?
questions.explanation:
2nd grade.

	Betsy loved to teach and read.

questions.text: What famous person did Mr. Tomashefsky tell Jack that his wife, Millie, was having an affair with?
questions.explanation:
Mike Tyson.

	He didn't want to accept that fact that she was having an affair with Freddy Ramirez.  All of his buddies from work were razzing him big time making him think it was Mike Tyson.

questions.text: How much money did Jack take in with him to the poker game with Tommy Corman?
questions.explanation:
$500.

	Jack went in with $500 and came out $65,000 in the hole.

questions.text: What was Chief Orman's favorite musical?
questions.explanation:
South Pacific.

	Chief's favorite is "South Pacific".  If you will recall he serenaded Mahi Mahi and Jack with his own rendition of his favorite tune.

questions.text: Which chapter of Flying Elvis' did Roy Bacon belong to?
questions.explanation:
Utah.

	Jack didn't realize what he was getting into when he got on that plane.

questions.text: What was the name of the loan shark that bailed Jack out from New York?
questions.explanation:
Sally Molars.

	Sally was not only a loan shark but a dentist.  Hence the name Sally Molars.

questions.text: What did Jack's mother make him promise to her before she died?
questions.correct: That he would never get married
options: That he would eventually get married
That he would never date anyone but Betsy
That he would never get engaged
questions.explanation:
That he would never get married.

	She didn't want anyone to marry him because no one would love him like she did.

questions.text: What cleaning function was Jack's mother performing in the dreams that he had about her?
questions.explanation:
vacuuming.

	He dreamed of her vacuumming naked.  What a site!

questions.text: Do Jack and Betsy eventually get married?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Jack and Betsy both get hitched. Jack was wearing a flying Elvis costume and Betsy was wearing a showgirl costume.  A few of the flying Elvis' attended the ceremony.  Thanks for playing!
